channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ariana Grande Says She Wore Oversize Hoodies in 2018 Because She Was 'Processing a Lot' and Wanted to 'Hide'
item.description: "I genuinely, at the time, did not have the mental energy to consider clothing," the star said for 'Vogue''s Life in Looks

item.title: “Hamnet” Director Chloé Zhao Reveals She's Training to Become a Death Doula: 'Terrified of Death My Whole Life'
item.description: Chloé Zhao's movie 'Hamnet' recently received eight Oscar nominations on top of its Golden Globe Awards win for Best Motion Picture - Drama

item.title: Amanda Seyfried Collapses After Singing Spontaneous Duet of 'Beautiful Disaster' with Kelly Clarkson
item.description: Seyfried referred to the live version of Clarkson's "Beautiful Disaster" as the "power ballad of this century"

item.title: Lily Collins Gives a Glimpse Into Daughter Tove's First Birthday Celebration as the New Mom Says She's 'Changed Our Lives'
item.description: The 'Emily in Paris' actress welcomed her daughter Tove last January
